display_long_description:
# *THE #1 VR SOCIAL COLLECTIBLE CARD GAME IS FREE TO PLAY!*
Collect **HUNDREDS OF CARDS**, compete in **EPIC PVP & PVE BATTLES**, and explore our **IMMERSIVE FANTASY HAVENS** which feels like playing cards at your local game shop!
[media]
# Unsure About Card Battlers but Love Strategy Games?
Cards & Tankards now has strategy board games you can play with your friends like **CHESS & CHECKERS** with more planned for future updates!
[media]
# Cracking Packs Has Never Been More Fun!
Experience the thrill of opening booster packs with friends, all without spending a dime! Unlike other CCGs, Cards & Tankards is built around a true **FREE-TO-PLAY** experience.
[media]
# Become The Best in the World!
Compete in the **RANKED ARENA** to become a Master of Cards & Tankards and have your username featured on the **GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS!**
[media]
# New to CCGs? No Problem!
Cards & Tankards is **EASY TO LEARN**, with friendly players always eager to teach you the basics, share more complex strategies, and raise a tankard to your first victory!
[media]

Collect **HUNDREDS OF CARDS**, compete in **EPIC PVP & PVE BATTLES**, and explore our **IMMERSIVE FANTASY HAVENS** which feels like playing cards at your local game shop!

# Unsure About Card Battlers but Love Strategy Games?
Cards & Tankards now has strategy board games you can play with your friends like **CHESS & CHECKERS** with more planned for future updates!
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491822897_2207211333017644_8618162970932046056_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=4qwrwHaPoHEQ7kNvwFcK8_Z&_nc_oc=Adn6hifHg_Q0p0cbL_LqzYUPOE8t9-hRHc3J2dQuGaPtYwHnjri96rJqiNgt7S3C080&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=EBIw4n12DRtvUxCal3NlDQ&oh=00_AfvFZpT1bOH1yoaYr8myxj-NUFJt2Yq0XI2btvX_QjRPGQ&oe=6992EF21)
# Cracking Packs Has Never Been More Fun!
Experience the thrill of opening booster packs with friends, all without spending a dime! Unlike other CCGs, Cards & Tankards is built around a true **FREE-TO-PLAY** experience.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499292712_2011949136257433_2240288442270214956_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=mbxC6h-F8vUQ7kNvwFRKLVb&_nc_oc=AdmpbNV0uOb1yqCV4WTC_YO7uAdQIO8ajpvsQ77vqKb4iFB08K4eOM9rHVn17YCaOOQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=EBIw4n12DRtvUxCal3NlDQ&oh=00_AftFc9GM2O7As01W5zSMjqXxCaiyBO90QWvhxIOuRf6fTA&oe=6992E5C9)
# Become The Best in the World!
Compete in the **RANKED ARENA** to become a Master of Cards & Tankards and have your username featured on the **GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS!**
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/507828918_1952193972016857_1573896307480103320_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=c-q9W9gnhBkQ7kNvwHJ96YA&_nc_oc=AdnQwT4xycACMXTLYV4GGcqJmsoisVLeHW3iV-f5LqTw7skvby9OizJweDj5rZIT6-0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=EBIw4n12DRtvUxCal3NlDQ&oh=00_AftFLUvXdAkNayE-yuC5h-caZpQSzqP9MVBsByLtJFgbbA&oe=6992EE52)
# New to CCGs? No Problem!
Cards & Tankards is **EASY TO LEARN**, with friendly players always eager to teach you the basics, share more complex strategies, and raise a tankard to your first victory!
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491822813_1735619753788707_6789934812689609528_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=u2Bm83Arl6oQ7kNvwH_Uukj&_nc_oc=AdnPfRHK3hBuNP7WKphZnXg69B58UI8oS9n5tPZNlSD70Gc0GiIhG7gUx68Lb9E1i2w&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=EBIw4n12DRtvUxCal3NlDQ&oh=00_AfsSwL54325kDxnwQopGFTAG_5GyeoqRbnAahmt2yMQ2fg&oe=6992DB98)
